QuestData.Title: The Sparring Arena
QuestData.Description: We owe you our freedom, and more. I have spoken to the others, we are willing to return with you to your garrison and teach those pitiful creatures you call "soldiers" how to properly fight.$b$bWe will also do our best to impart our knowledge to you, Commander. Should you have need of us when in the wilds of Gorgrond, simply call us.$b$bYou may wish to warn Limbflayer of our coming.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Limbflayer at Beastwatch in Gorgrond.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Limbflayer at Beastwatch in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: Kash'drakor is coming here?! Ha! I once saw him cut through a dozen Laughing Skulls because they had his son.$b$bHe is the purist expression of destruction.
